channel.title: Sending a certain person to a website and sending everyone. PI

item.title: Sending a certain person to a website and sending everyone. PI
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("sendgoogle")) { for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[j]; c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Sending a certain person to a website and sending everyone. PI
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

I have this code:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("sendgoogle")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000); }
But I want to make it so I can send one person to that website and make a seperate code to make everyone go to the website, can you helpp?
